docs.text: james l . brooks , one of the developers of the simpsons and director of broadcast news , returns to the big screen with this entertaining , if slightly flawed comedy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: nicholson plays melvin udall , probably the most horrible person ever on the screen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he's racist , homophobic , and never has a good word to say to anyone .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: so , nobody talks to him , except waitress carol conelly ( t . v
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sitcom star hunt , who was last seen in twister , 1996 ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: naturally , udall , conelly and gay neighbor simon bishop ( kinnear ) who nicholson hates , all hit it off in the end .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: like good will hunting ( 1997 ) and titanic ( 1997 ) , even though the outcome is completely obvious , as good as it gets is an enjoyable , funny and warm comedy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: nicholson is hilarious as melvin , churning out insults with superb relish .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: only nicholson could get away with the lines that melvin delivers .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: hunt is also good as waitress carol , and easily rises to the challenge of nicholson .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there's also ( thankfully ) a bit of chemistry between them .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: kinnear , as the gay neighbor , seems to have a slightly underwritten role , he's more of a plot convience than a character .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: although his performance is good , his character just seems to exist to help melvin and carol come together .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in fact , the scene stealer is simon's dog , who is funnier than nicholson .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but then again , pets are always cute on screen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: providing solid support is cuba gooding , jnr ( jerry maguire , 1996 ) and yeardly smith ( who is the voice of lisa simpsons in the simpsons ) although gooding isn't as good as is character in maguire , he is still fun .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he overacts a little , but not so much as to be annoying .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: smith is also good , although she has a fairly small role .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: even director lawrence kasdan ( body heat , 1981 ) makes an appearance as a doctor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but this is primarily nicholsons film , and every scene he's in , he's steals it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he's character is so hateful , though , it's amazing that anyone talks to him at all , especially carol .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and this is the films main problem .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's totally unbelievable that carol would ever consider liking melvin .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she doesn't fall in love with him naturally , the film forces her to fall in love with him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: also , melvins character seems to go too nice , too quickly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i would doubt anyone with a character like melvins would be able to turn back to a nice , loving person .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it would take a helluva long time , much longer than this film would like to make out .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: brooks direction is good , though , if a bit average , but he usually manages to get an emotion out of the audience .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he handles the comedy scenes better than the sentimental ones ( he tends to pile on to much schmaltz ) but generally he's good .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there's also a nice soundtrack by veteran composer hans zimmer .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but , generally , as good as it gets achieves what it sets out to do , which is to make the audience feel good by the end of the movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the movie is a bit overlong , but nicholson is such good fun that the running time passes by pretty quickly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: overall , as good as it gets is a fun movie , even though it may be unbelivable , and certainly worth seeing ( if just for jack nicholsons performance . )
docs.label: positive

docs.text: not quite as good as it gets ( pardon the bad joke ) , but still good fun .
docs.label: positive
